item.description:
The newest Batman movie opens on July 20 and it looks great! We will be heading to the 7:30 showing. IMPORTANT: You must buy your tickets asap- the 8:30 show is already sold out! Get your tickets at: http://www.amctheatres.com/movies/the-dark-knight-rises

Please do not wait to get your ticket! We will meet at 7pm directly inside the main entrance. Please arrive on time because we will be heading into the movie promptly to get good seats.Â  After, we can head for drinks at a nearby bar.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside main entrance on the right. If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000!
item.name: Opening Night for The Dark Knight Rises at AMC Boston Common
